question: How do the plasma concentrations of amantadine extended release and amantadine immediate release compare?
ideal_answer: When it is given at bedtime, it reaches plasma concentration approximately twice the level achieved by amantadine immediate release.

snippets.text: When it is given at bedtime, it reaches plasma concentration approximately twice the level achieved by amantadine immediate release.
PK modeling suggested the recommended daily ADS-5102 dosage (274 mg qhs) resulted in 1.4- to 2.0-fold higher amantadine plasma concentrations during the day versus amantadine IR.
